Keywords: Avengers , Scientist , Spider-Man Family
Real Name: Peter Parker
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) REALLY? YOU THINK I COULD PULL IT OFF?: Spider-Man starts the game with the Disney+ #s004 Cloak of Levitation equipped.
IF YOU CAN MAKE IT HERE, YOU CAN MAKE IT ANYWHERE: Super Senses, but succeeds on 4-6. When Spider-Man uses it and succeeds, after resolutions give the attacker an action token.

May 6, 2022
Goop
For 80 points he's pretty good. I'm not really a fan of quake on higher point pieces, he does have that good 50/50 SS along with CR and Outwit. This is a very good representation of what a spider-man dial should be. How good he is will likely depend how hot you get with your SS rolls dishing out tokens.
April 9, 2022
DatHomieSilverSurfer
WelcomeToDie, I’m in the exact same boat in regards to this figure… finally a Spider-Man that can take a hit without crumpling into dust. The stats and powers do a great job representing normal level Peter. It’s clearly not Sorcerer Supreme Spidey, but the cloak makes him mechanically so everything he should always be able to do… seriously, how do we not have more than a handful of spiders worth carry when him swinging someone around on his webs is one of his most iconic visuals Anyways, I’m love with a Spider-Man dial for the first time in years.
April 8, 2022
WelcomeToDIE
Not sure I see the sourcerer supreme spider man represented much, but this is by far the best spider man we've gotten since the rule and scale change. If you pay the 5 points to give him the cloak, thereby giving him sidestep and the ability to get up a building and carry a person, you've pretty much got everything you need for a standard spider. Even things that are usually missing like willpower. I wish there was some incapacitate for his webs but I'm so high on his lengthy dial after years and years of 6 clicks or less, that it's just a footnote really.
